MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Magdala Mews and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.24am. Our engineers have on site at the Donaldsons School substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.30am on Thursday 19th November 2020.
